attacks.name: Attack
attacks.syntax: Our forces will be available again in (\d{1,2})\.(\d{1,2}) days

spells.name: Builders Boon
spells.syntax: Our builders have been blessed with unnatural speed for (\d{1,2}) days!

spells.name: Clear Sight
spells.syntax: Our police have been blessed with clear sight for (\d{1,2}) day

spells.name: Clear Sight
spells.syntax: We have made our lands extraordinarily fertile for (\d{1,2}) days!

spells.name: Fog
spells.syntax: Our lands are filled with fog, slowing opposing armies for (\d{1,2}) days

spells.name: Inspire Army
spells.syntax: We expect maintenance costs to be reduced for (\d{1,2}) days!

spells.name: Love and Peace
spells.syntax: We expect birth rates to be higher for (\d{1,2}) days!

spells.name: Mage's Fury
spells.syntax: The fire of Mage's Fury burns in our wizards' eyes for (\d{1,2}) days!

spells.name: Magic Shield
spells.syntax: The magical auras within our province will protect us from the black magic of our enemies for (\d{1,2}) days

spells.name: Meteor Showers
spells.syntax: Meteors rain across our lands, and are not expected to stop for (\d{1,2}) days.

spells.name: Mind Focus
spells.syntax: Our students are blessed with excellent concentration for (\d{1,2}) day

spells.name: Minor Protection
spells.syntax: Our realm is now under a sphere of minor protection for (\d{1,2}) days!

spells.name: Nature Blessing
spells.syntax: Our lands have been blessed by nature for (\d{1,2}) days, and will be protected from drought and storms.

spells.name: Patriotism
spells.syntax: Our people are excited about the military and will signup more quickly for (\d{1,2}) days!

spells.name: Reflect Magic
spells.syntax: Spells cast upon our lands will have a chance of being reflected back upon the caster for (\d{1,2}) days

spells.name: Storms
spells.syntax: Storms are ravaging our lands! This will last for (\d{1,2}) days.

spells.name: Town Watch
spells.syntax: Our peasants will help defend our lands for (\d{1,2}) day
